Package io.github.eutro.wasm2j.core.passes

Interface IRPass<A,B>

Type Parameters:
A - The input type.
B - The result type.
All Known Subinterfaces:
InPlaceIRPass<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChainedPass, CheckJava, CollapseJumps, ComputeDomFrontier, ComputeDoms, ComputeLiveVars, ComputePreds, ComputeUses, EliminateDeadBlocks, EliminateDeadVars, FindBoolSelects, ForPass.BasicBlocks, ForPass.Insns, Handlify, IdentityElimination, InferTypes, InferTypes.Java, JavaToJir, JirToJava, LinearScan, LowerIntrinsics, LowerPhis, MergeConds, PropagateConstants, SSAify, Stackify, VerifyIntegrity, WasmToWir, WirToJir, WirToJir.WirToJirPerFunc
public interface IRPass<A,B>
A pass to run on some part of the IR (e.g. Module, JClass, Function), which may modify the IR, or convert it to a different form.

A pass may be in-place, in which case it must have the same input and result types, and should return true for isInPlace().

See Also:
  • io.github.eutro.wasm2j.core.ssa
